url.description: The URL of the Azure DevOps host. For Azure DevOps Cloud, use https://dev.azure.com. For Azure DevOps Server, use your server URL.

deploymentType.description: The type of Azure DevOps deployment

useTfsPath.description: Use legacy TFS path format (/tfs) in API URLs. Required for older TFS installations (TFS 2018 and earlier). When true, API URLs will include /tfs in the path (e.g., https://server/tfs/collection/_apis/...).

orgs.description: List of organizations to sync with. For Cloud, this is the organization name. For Server, this is the collection name. All projects and repositories visible to the provided `token` will be synced, unless explicitly defined in the `exclude` property.

projects.description: List of specific projects to sync with. Expected to be formatted as '{orgName}/{projectName}' for Cloud or '{collectionName}/{projectName}' for Server.

repos.description: List of individual repositories to sync with. Expected to be formatted as '{orgName}/{projectName}/{repoName}'.
List of repositories to exclude from syncing. Glob patterns are supported.

projects.description: List of projects to exclude from syncing. Glob patterns are supported.

size.description: Exclude repositories based on their size.

min.description: Minimum repository size (in bytes) to sync (inclusive). Repositories less than this size will be excluded from syncing.

max.description: Maximum repository size (in bytes) to sync (inclusive). Repositories greater than this size will be excluded from syncing.
